correctness.rationale: Several core fields match the article (PEALD with DMZ/O2, Ar carrier and O2 purge, 100 W plasma, 400 mTorr, 120 °C, 2 s plasma exposure, saturation at ≥125 mTorr·s, GPC ≈2.9 Å/cycle, ~80 nm thickness with ~276 cycles, refractive index ≈2, polycrystalline, AFM roughness up to ~1.9 nm, Zn:O ≈1:1). However, many values are incorrect or not traceable: (1) Resistivity is given as 5 OHM-M, but the paper reports ~5 Ω·cm within the ALD window; this should be ~0.05 OHM-M. (2) Device properties (μ_FE, V_TH, SS, I_ON/I_OFF, device structure) are not reported in the paper and appear fabricated. (3) Optical band gap 3.3 eV and characterization by spectroscopic ellipsometry are not reported; PL shows band-edge emission (~385 nm) but no band gap value is provided. (4) Absorption coefficient set to 0 is unsupported. (5) Uniformity (5%) and conformality (aspect ratio 10) are not reported. (6) Film density 5.6 g/dm^3 is both unsupported and unit-incorrect if intended as 5.6 g/cm^3 (should be 5600 g/dm^3 by the schema’s unit). (7) Carrier density (1e16 m^-3) is not reported and likely incorrect; the authors note Hall n was erratic and do not provide a value. (8) Nucleation period (10 cycles) is not reported. (9) Precursor dosing time 125 ms is not given; the paper reports DMZ exposures in mTorr·s, not pulse time. (10) FlowRates ‘precursorFlow’ = 15 sccm corresponds to Ar carrier, not the DMZ flow; DMZ flow was not quantified numerically. (11) Elemental concentration ‘50%’ is not explicitly reported, though 1:1 stoichiometry is; provide only the atomic ratio or clearly justify concentrations. (12) OtherAspects: filmStability and reproducibility are not substantiated beyond noting resistivity measurements were reproducible. These issues reduce factual alignment and traceability. Correct or remove the non-reported/fabricated fields and fix unit conversions (especially resistivity and density).

completeness.rationale: Several core details align with the article (PEALD ZnO using DMZ/O2 plasma, Ar=15 sccm, O2=80 sccm, plasma power=100 W, T=120 °C, GPC≈2.9 Å/cycle in the ALD window, 10 s purges, ~80 nm film, polycrystalline by XRD, n≈2, rms≈1.9 nm). However, many fields are unreported in the paper or have unit/value errors, reducing completeness and traceability. Key issues: (1) Pressure unit/value mismatch: article uses 400 mTorr; extracted uses 400 mmHg (should be ~0.4 mmHg). (2) Resistivity unit error: article ~5 Ω·cm within the ALD window; extracted gives 5 Ω·m (should be 0.05 Ω·m if converted). (3) Precursor dosing time (125 ms) and nucleationPeriod (10 cycles) are not reported. (4) Optical absorption coefficient and band gap (3.3 eV via ellipsometry) are not reported; method attribution is incorrect. (5) Carrier density value is not reported; mobility ~1 cm²/V·s is plausible but reported as erratic. (6) Uniformity (5%), conformality (AR=10), and film density (value and g/dm³ unit) are not reported; density value/unit are inconsistent with ZnO. (7) DeviceProperties (μ_FE, V_TH, SS, on/off, device structure) are not in the article. (8) Elemental concentration “50%” is not explicitly given; only stoichiometric Zn:O≈1:1 is supported after sputter. (9) Co-reactant should be clearly indicated as O2 plasma (not merely O2). To improve completeness and schema compliance while preserving factual alignment: correct pressure and resistivity units/values; specify co‑reactant as O2 plasma; remove or mark as not reported unsupported fields (precursor dosing time, nucleation period, absorption coefficient, band gap, carrier density, uniformity, conformality, film density, deviceProperties), and keep composition as atomic ratio 1:1 as supported by XPS/EDS.
